code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RunningExercise=_ref=>{let{goBack}=_ref;const[lapTimes,setLapTimes]=useState([]);const[elapsedTime,setElapsedTime]=useState(0);const[isRunning,setIsRunning]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{let intervalId;if(isRunning){const startTime=Date.now()-elapsedTime;intervalId=setInterval(()=>{setElapsedTime(Date.now()-startTime);},100);}else{clearInterval(intervalId);}return()=>clearInterval(intervalId);},[isRunning,elapsedTime]);const handleStartStopClick=()=>{if(!isRunning){setIsRunning(true);}};const recordLap=()=>{if(isRunning){setLapTimes([...lapTimes,elapsedTime]);setIsRunning(false);}};const formatTime=time=>{const minutes=Math.floor(time/60000);const seconds=Math.floor(time%60000/1000);const tenths=Math.floor(time%1000/100);return"".concat(minutes,":").concat(seconds.toString().padStart(2,'0'),".").concat(tenths);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Running Exercise"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stopwatch",children:formatTime(elapsedTime)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStartStopClick,disabled:isRunning,children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:recordLap,disabled:!isRunning,children:"Stop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Laps"}),lapTimes.map((time,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Lap ".concat(index+1,": ").concat(formatTime(time))},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setIsRunning(false);goBack();},children:"Back to Menu"})]});};export default RunningExercise;
